title: All trains on the NEL will skip NE14 Hougang Station due to a security incident

updates.text: 02/04, 4.16pm: NEL service has resumed. Once again, we are sorry for the inconvenience caused.
02/04, 4.07pm: All NEL trains will now stop at NE14 HGN. We are sorry for inconvenience caused. Free Passing bus from NE12 SER to NE15 BGK.
02/04, 3.56pm: All trains on the NEL will skip NE14 HGN Station due to a security incident. Free Passing bus from NE12 SER to NE15 BGK.
02/04, 3.06pm: All trains on the NEL will skip NE14 HGN Station due to a security incident. Free passing bus from NE12 SER to NE15 BGK.
02/04, 2.55pm: All trains on the NEL will skip NE14 Hougang Station due to a security incident.
